评论详情: I'm a big gal. This thing is perfect. I've always wanted to dress a little more gothy/punky/dark cozy but it's hard being plus size. I love everything about this. It can adjust, it feels good but light too, it looks sturdy, the ribbon and loops seem sturdy. Highly recommend
The buttons are plastic so they look kinda cheap but it fits well and feels good and is very flattering. Take out the ribbon to wash.
This is a great skirt. I get a lot of compliments while wearing it. It's a bit longer than most skirts which is really helpful. And it is a good quality for the amount it cost!

I ordered a size down and it fit perfectly. It was slightly snug but had good stretch to it. The straps were a little short. It had two holes to adjust them but I wanted them a little longer so I cut an extra hole in each strap because there is a little excess fabric, and then the straps fit great after that. It was comfortable and breathable. Perfect for the look is was going for to my concert. Felt flattering.
Fits well. So many options to style it. One of my favorite pieces in my wardrobe!

评论概述: A bit long but I love it!
评论详情: I'm about 5'5.5" and 188ish lbs. Normally a US14.  Generally I like my skirts to hit a few inches above my knee. This sits an inch or two under my bust and ends pretty much right at my knees. It's a stretchy swimsuit-ish material so not tight at all. Honestly I could have gone a size down but then I don't think I'd be so excited to wear it out. I think if I pair it with some chunky heels and a tank top it'll be perfect
Really liked how it looks, washes well, and just I just really like it
Very nice looks just like the picture

评论概述: Not going to fit properly if you have really big boobs.
评论详情: It was okay, but the waist part hit me about mid boob and it looked stupid. I had to uncross the straps to get it to hit where it’s supposed to. It looks okay but not great. Wouldn’t buy it again but too lazy to return.
The buttons feel like they are about to fall off, stitching seems off, and generally does not feel or look as good as the pictures made it seem

评论概述: Soooo cute!!  My teen daughter loves it!
评论详情: My daughter was soo excited when my daughter received this dress for her birthday.  The style fits her design aesthetic very well.  As a mom, this washes very well and looks flattering!
I bought this to wear as a cosplay and now I may have to wear in everyday life cause it is so comfortable.
Unflattering it's too big and too long...not what I was expecting unfortunately. I wear an XL this just wast the skirt for me.

True to size! Small amount of stretch. Better quality then expected. Fits my full figure wonderfully. Lots of compliments when I wear this. Will definitely order from them again. The bf loved this on me.
It would have been great if I would have got the right size and at the right time for what I needed it for.
